message.body: Hello!
Good morning!
Is it pouring rain where you are? I was so happy that i found my poncho.
The rain Will hopeully cool the weather down. I'm at home now and will be going to work soon.
What color is your poncho?
Poncho is reversible blue/yellow. I tend to wear it blue side out.
Definitely looking forward to cooler weather.
Lol I havent worn a poncho since my kid years!
Do you take public transportation instead of driving?
I have to drive - the bus that goes from the green line to the jcc is unreliable. But the jcc campus is large and the staff lot is far enough away...
Jcc? What college is that?
Septa buses are absolutely "the worst"
Sorry - Greater Boston Jewish Community Center in Newton MA. I work there.
Yeah - i have a friend who teaches @ upenn who used to live up here & his opinion of septa is pretty bad.
(1/2) Pretty bad in need...especially the buses! Wow...so jcc has an entire campus? What do you do there? Side bar...I'm a fan pf accents, especially the boston
(2/2) accent...
Fan of#
Sorry - been busy - now home w kids. Hubby made burgers. He's the one of us who can cook.
Haha...nice I visited family because they wouls have food. How many kids do you have?
Two - girl age 5 and boy age 7.5
Both currently fighting bedtime. Put their Daddy on duty because my alarm clock goes off @ 5:30am.
